announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 5th January, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Monday borns and Knights and ladies of St John International. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: The Epiphany of the Lord

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Marriage School will reopen early February, 2025. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2025 should please pick up registration forms from the office of the Rector.
announcements.title: St Bakhita Marriage School

masses.details: Offertory will be by Christian Mothers' Association and Sunday borns
